author: reschke
msg: OAK-2093 - fix select clause so it uses meta.lastmod

author: rvesse
msg: Allow UpdateFactory to support arbitrary syntaxes
i.e. Remove the restriction that the syntax must be SPARQL 1.1/ARQ
The relevant method already contains a later check for the case where no parser is registered so the more restrictive check is unecessary
and it restricts users from using extended syntaxes

author: rgodfrey
msg: QPID-6103 : Fix NPE which occurred when first flow was sent before receiving initial flow from partner
